scripts.compile_cjs: tsc dist/cjs/src/index.ts dist/cjs/src/proxy/index.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist/cjs --sourcemap --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --strict --noImplicitReturns --noUnusedLocals --noUnusedParameters --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --noEmitHelpers --importHelpers --downlevelIteration --lib es5,es2015.iterable,es2015.collection,es2015.promise,dom
scripts.compile_module_es: tsc dist/es/src/index.ts dist/es/src/proxy/index.ts   -m ES2015   --outDir dist/es  --sourcemap --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --strict --noImplicitReturns --noUnusedLocals --noUnusedParameters --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --noEmitHelpers --importHelpers --downlevelIteration --lib es5,es2015.iterable,es2015.collection,es2015.promise,dom
scripts.cover: rm -rf ./.nyc_output ./coverage && NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html --reporter=lcov --exclude=node_modules --exclude=spec-js/test --exclude=spec-js/src/storage/lovefield.js --exclude=spec-js/src/shared/Logger.js --exclude=spec-js/src/utils/option.js --exclude=spec-js/src/utils/valid.js tman --mocha spec-js/test/run.js && nyc report
scripts.test: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test tman --mocha spec-js/test/run.js
scripts.watch_cjs: tsc src/index.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist --sourcemap --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --strict --noImplicitReturns --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --noEmitHelpers --lib es5,es2015.iterable,es2015.collection,es2015.promise,dom -w
